Sentencas: Ceria-based electrolytes have been widely investigated in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (SOPC), which might be operated at 500-600 degrees C. Samarium doped (20 mol%) ceria (20SDC) one of the most promising material in this class of compounds.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of Ce0.75Sm0.2Li0.05O1.95

Sentencas: In this work we report effect of lattice substitution of 5 mol % Li on Sm in (20SDC).
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of Ce0.75Sm0.2Li0.05O1.95

Sentencas: It was prepared by citrate-nitrate auto combustion synthesis having a powder of average particle size similar to 50 nm.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of Ce0.75Sm0.2Li0.05O1.95

Sentencas: The sintered density of more than 98% of the theoretical density at 950 degrees C has been achieved.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of Ce0.75Sm0.2Li0.05O1.95

Sentencas: Increased ionic conductivity (lattice) at 500 degrees C has also been achieved in Ce0.75Sm0.2Li0.05O1.95 compare to that of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.95.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of Ce0.75Sm0.2Li0.05O1.95

Sentencas: Corresponding activation energy of conduction similar to 0.7 eV has been calculated in the temperature range of 200-600 degrees C.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of Ce0.75Sm0.2Li0.05O1.95

Sentencas: In reducing atmosphere the electrical conductivity has not been altered much.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of Ce0.75Sm0.2Li0.05O1.95

Sentencas: Thus Ce0.75Sm0.2Li0.05O1.95 has been found to be quite promising in terms of reducing the processing temperature as well as operating temperature of SOFC.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of Ce0.75Sm0.2Li0.05O1.95
